bibl.title: A Letter and a Petition: Two Ptolemaic Fragments
bibl.seg: Konstantine Panegyres, A Letter and a Petition: Two Ptolemaic Fragments.

Publication of fragments of two Ptolemaic papyri from the collection of the Bodleian Library, Oxford. The first fragment is part of a letter (probably a report about a local dispute), while the second is part of a petition by a woman. The papyri both come from Gurob in the Fayum and can be assigned to the third century BC.
bibl.note: Publication of fragments of two Ptolemaic papyri from the collection of the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
